title: SoundClouds, Participatory Music Generation Exhibition
confernece: A participatory music exhibition that generates real-time soundscapes through user interactions with inflatables. Developed an object detection model by fine-tuning YOLO, achieving 98.3% accuracy, in collaboration with music technologists and visual artists.

title: FORECST, Online Hackathon Website
confernece: A full-stack website built with React.js and Firebase during COVID-19 to host virtual hackathons for novice programmers.

title: MYFIT, Clothing Size Recommendation Android Application
confernece: An Android application developed in Java to enhances online clothing shopping experience by providing visualizations of clothing sizes.
